graduateStudents.about: My research is in group decision making, I'm studying the relationship between computational complexity and demonstrability.
I am interested in recognition models and algorithms, with focus on plan recognition in real world domains. I am currently working on plan recognition projects in education and cyber security.
My Ph.D deals with reaching fair agreements in group settings such as fair division (indivisible goods, share rent etc.) and cooperative games.
My thesis work focuses on understanding and influencing the behavior and performance of users in large scale task systems.
My thesis work focuses on modeling and predicting student disengagement in e-learning systems.
My main interests are NLP and AI, My thesis topic is on Modeling student behavior in online forums. Predicting responses, staff intervention and cognitive engagement for student posts.

undergraduateStudents.about: Software Engineering Student, currently working on the Incentive Server
nota-bene: building data bases and help to improve exists projects

alumni.about: I am currently working on developing algorithms and intelligent systems to support information sharing in distributed teamwork. I am broadly interested in AI and HCI.

I researched how students improve their problem solving of statistics problems using worked examples, correct and with errors. I used different visualizations of the same examples, linear visualization and hierarchical visualization, built by Plan Recognition algorithm.
I researched algorithm Selection in Bilateral Negotiation.
